definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)

sentences.english: EVA mousepad is delicate and fragile , outward appearance is delicate , economy is pragmatic.
sentences.chinese: EVA鼠標墊小巧玲瓏，外觀秀氣，又經濟實用。

sentences.english: I don’t like the way mouse pads look, so I use fabric scraps instead.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡鼠標墊的樣子，所以用了碎布替代。

sentences.english: Which has Yi Yang City to sell hell fire mousepad's.
sentences.chinese: 益陽哪有賣地獄火鼠標墊的。

sentences.english: Where can Nanjing purchase USB cartoon mousepad?
sentences.chinese: 南京哪裏能買到USB卡通鼠標墊？

sentences.english: Have the wrister function because of whose design , also call wrister mousepad.
sentences.chinese: 因其設計有護腕功能，也稱護腕鼠標墊。

definition: case, casing, cabinet or housing (of a computer, photocopier etc)
felt-tip pen/roller ball pen/gel ink pen
